about_the_game:
Dive into the Underworld in Rusalka Wrath: Engage in a non-stop 2D Mafia shootout where every decision matters. Equipped with a variety of weapons and skills, you can defeat enemies and defeat their guns at every turn. Whether you're dodging bullets or accurately firing grenades, everything you encounter requires quick thinking and hard thinking.

Rusalka Wrath draws you into a world full of danger and deception, every action carries weight. The game's beautifully hand-drawn cuts, inspired by manga and anime, bring the intense plot to life, making every victory and betrayal all the more impressive as you venture into the criminal underworld and you will realize that survival is about more than just flowing firepower—so much so that the technique, time , was about staying one step ahead.

short_description: Dive into the gritty world of Rusalka Wrath, a 2D Mafia shooter filled with intense action and awesome combat. Unleash deadly weapons, from precision rifles to explosive grenades, as you fight for control of the underworld. It’s all backed up by an intriguing story inspired by manga.
